title: Rakuten Symphony | Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
**Education:** B.Tech CSE from Tier 3 College
**Years of Experience:** 2.7 YOE
**Prior Experience:** Product-based
**Date of the Offer:** October 2022
**Company:** Rakuten Symphony (A group of Rakuten)
**Title/Level:** Software Engineer
**Location:** Bangalore
**Salary:** 17.5L Fixed + 1L Variable
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** 18.5L
**Benefits:** Standard Rakuten Benefits + Free Food

Software Engineer is Level 2 position in Rakuten as Level 1 is Associate Software Engineer.

title: Twilio || L2 || Compensation
content:
Education: B.Tech in Tier-3
Years of Experience: 2.10 Yr
Prior Experience: Product based MNC
Prior CTC: ~12L
Company: Twilio India
Title/Level: Software Engineer - L2
Location: Bangalore, India
Fixed Base: ~21.5L
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $30k stock grant vested over 4 years
Retirals: ~1.5L
Bonus: Performance-based
Total comp (Salary + Signing Bonus + Stock) for first year: ~29L
Benefits: Standard Twilio Benefits, Connectivity: ~5.5k (monthly), WFH setup: ~50k

Please give your suggestion, is it good to join with this offer? 
And also any feedback would be appreciated.

title: Jio | SDE-1 | Bangalore
content:
**Education:** B.Tech CSE from Tier 3 College
**Years of Experience:** 1.5 YOE
**Prior Experience:** Service-Based
**Date of the Offer:** September 2021
**Company:** Jio
**Title/Level:** SDE-1
**Location:** Bangalore
**Salary:** 11L Fixed + 1L Variable
**Bonus:** 1L (Retention Bonus)
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** 13L
**Benefits:** Standard Jio Benefits

That was my first switch from a Service based to Product based company, so I accepted the offer. This opening was for JioMart project.

title: Uber | L4 | Bengaluru | Accepted
content:
College: Tier 3
Education: BTech( CSE )
Years of Experience: ~4
Company: Uber
Title/Level: L4 (SDE-2)
Location: Remote(Banglore, India)
Prev Comp: 33L+Bonus(11 lakhs RSU)
Base Salary: 4705000
Relocation: 200000
Signing Bonus: 5 LPA
RSU: 60000 USD (25% each year vesting)
Vesting Period: 4 years
Variable: 6750000
Total comp 1st year (Base + Bonus + Stock): 68.8L
Benefits: Standard uber benefits 
TC:- 73.25L(excluding pf)

Other offer:
[Flexport Offer](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5168979/Flexport-or-SDE-2-or-Bengaluru-or-Accepted)

title: Capgemini | Senior Analyst | Mumbai (On Campus)
content:
**Education:** B.Tech CSE from Tier 3 College
**Years of Experience:** Fresher
**Prior Experience:** 0
**Date of the Offer:** Jan 2020
**Company:** Capgemini
**Title/Level:** Senior Analyst / Software Engineer
**Location:** Mumbai
**Salary:** 6.8L
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** 6.8L
**Benefits:** Standard Capgemini Benefits

As this was my on-campus placement, I accepted the offer.

**Note -** Around 25 people got selected from my campus for Senior Analyst role. Capgemini called us for **3-months of intersnship** in Pune location with **stipend of 18k/month**. Stay facilities was provided inside Capgemini campus with all standard benefits.
